bug.short_desc: List indicator doesn't appear using demo code and in playground

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
I'm not quite sure where to file this as I think it may be an issue with the demobrowser code more than qx.
I thought I had a problem with my code because I used the demo code here in the playground: http://preview.tinyurl.com/k2al8zd and I found that the indicator does not appear when you are reordering the list.
I then tried the demo here: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/3.5/demobrowser/#ui~DragDrop.html and it worked.
So I think the generated code has an inconsistency with what is actually running on the demobrowser.
So, in the end I can't figure out what is causing the indicator to disappear since it works in one place but not the other.
